20101222163904.000|20101222163906.000|CC1|>> THAT'S TRADITIONAL.          
20101222163906.000|20101222163907.000|CC1|>> THAT'S THE MOST TRADITIONAL. 
20101222163907.000|20101222163910.000|CC1|>> WHAT YOU'RE GOING TO DO IS   
20101222163910.000|20101222163912.000|CC1|MAKE A TWIST TO IT.             
20101222163912.000|20101222163912.000|CC1|YOU'RE GOING TO DO A COUPLE OF  
20101222163912.000|20101222163917.000|CC1|RUBS.                           
20101222163917.000|20101222163923.000|CC1|>> SMOKED PAPRIKA, AND I MIX    
20101222163923.000|20101222163925.000|CC1|THAT WITH A LITTLE RYE BREAD AND
20101222163925.000|20101222163929.000|CC1|YOU GET THIS LOVELY, CRUMBLY    
20101222163929.000|20101222163930.000|CC1|CRUST ON THAT.                  
20101222163930.000|20101222163933.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT PEOPLE TO KNOW THAT 
20101222163933.000|20101222163935.000|CC1|IT'S OKAY TO TRIM THE FAT OFF OF
20101222163935.000|20101222163935.000|CC1|LAMB.                           
20101222163935.000|20101222163937.000|CC1|>> THE WHOLE RACK AS A SORT OF  
20101222163937.000|20101222163938.000|CC1|CAP OF FAT.

20101222164539.000|20101222164542.000|CC1|BY COLD, IT CAN BE SET OFF BY

20101222164600.000|20101222164602.000|CC1|WE LIKE TO KEEP OUR CORE

20101222164615.000|20101222164617.000|CC1|SHIFTS THE COLD TO THE CENTER OF
